title: 09/07/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 09/07/21 DPS Best Of
description:
In this Best Of The Dan Patrick Show, Dan talks to Eagles starting QB Jalen Hurts about his allegiance to Alabama and Oklahoma, as well as his starting role with the Eagles. Also, friend of the show Darius Rucker calls in and makes a bet with the Danettes. Finally, ESPN college football analyst Greg McElroy recaps all the action from Week 1 of the season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
